desc: Esther creates bespoke pieces with special significance to only-you, such as signet rings, commitment, engagement, wedding and milestone jewellery. With special interest in remakes and heirloom gemstones. Esther Weinberg creates pieces you will literally not find anywhere else – as they are all made by hand.

layout.text:
Lovingly crafted artisan jewellery, handmade in Melbourne.
Creating bespoke jewellery with special significance to only-you, as well as ready to wear and made-to-order collections with diverse inspiration. 
My studio is located inside the renowned Manchester Unity building, in inner-city Melbourne.
